name: imported rifle magazine
description: An uncommon 30-round magazine made for imported automatic rifles.

name: imported drum magazine
description: An uncommon 40-round drum magazine for imported automatic rifles.

name: ammo belt
description: An belt of light rifle ammunition consisting of metal linkages which disintegrate upon firing.

name: ammo belt
description: An ammo belt designed for heavier machineguns consisting of metal linkages which disintegrate upon firing.

name: ammo belt
description: An ammo belt designed for mounted machineguns consisting of metal linkages which disintegrate upon firing.

name: advanced SMG magazine
description: A surprisingly compact 50-round magazine for use with the advanced SMG.

name: extended pistol magazine
description: An extended 30-round magazine for use with semi-automatic pistols.

name: pistol magazine
description: An factory issue 15-round magazine for use with semi-automatic pistols

name: extended SMG magazine
description: A 50-round drum magazine for use with submachineguns.  Much greater capacity but less reliable than factory specification magazines.

name: submachinegun magazine
description: A standard capacity 30-round magazine for use with submachineguns.

name: battle rifle magazine
description: A standard 20-round magazine for military issue battle rifles.

name: extended battle rifle magazine
description: An extended 30-round magazine for military issue battle rifles.

name: small light rifle magazine
description: A compact 10-round magazine commonly usable with both semi-automatic and automatic rifles.

name: light rifle magazine
description: A 30-round box magazines for use with automatic rifles.

name: light rifle drum magazine
description: A 50-round magazine with a bulky green drum for use with automatic rifles and machine guns.

name: antimateriel rifle magazine
description: A 10-round magazine which holds heavy rifle ammo for use with an antimateriel rifle

name: magnum pistol magazine
description: A 7-round magazine which holds revolver ammo for use with a magnum pistol
